thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Goncalo Guedes signs for PSG as United lose £25.5m battle for ‘next Cristiano Ronaldo’
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Goncalo Guedes signs for PSG as United lose £25.5m battle for ‘next Cristiano Ronaldo’

author: ashilton
title: Manchester United transfer news: Goncalo Guedes signs for PSG as United lose £25.5m battle for ‘next Cristiano Ronaldo’

persons.name: patrick kluivert moment of the week

text:
PARIS SAINT-GERMAIN have beaten Manchester United to the signing Goncalo Guedes. 
The Portuguese winger joins for £25.5million having penned a four-and-a-half-year deal with the French champions. Twitter 7 Manchester United have lost out to PSG in the race for Benfica’s Goncalo Guedes 
Guedes was left out of Benfica’s matchday squad at the weekend, fuelling speculation of a move abroad. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
United boss Jose Mourinho was though to be keen on bringing Guedes to Old Trafford after selling Memphis Depay to Lyon. 
But Guedes, who scored 11 goals and provided 16 assists in 68 benfica outings, has instead opted for the French capital. Twitter Guedes has won two caps for Portugal by the age of 20 Twitter Guedes got to work at PSG training ground on Wednesday EPA The versatile winger has been tempted to move to France by Patrick Kluivert Moment of the Week : Wayne Rooney breaks the Manchester United goal scoring record EPA 7 Guedes joins for an initial £25.5m having finalised his deal on Tuesday night 
It takes PSG's January spending spree past the £60m mark, having already clinched a deal to sign Julian Draxler from Wolfsburg. 
Versatile winger Guedes has helped himself to seven goals and seven assists already this season and will provide competition for Edinson Cavani in attack. 
PSG were looking to strengthen this month after a shaky start to Unai Emery’s tenure. IF they keep Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil like father, like sim Diego Simeone's son Giovanni subject of £15million bids from La Liga sides Sevilla and Villarreal HOU THE MAN Villa boss Steve Bruce makes third signing in two days by bringing in Barnsley midfield ace Conor Hourihane 'KING ARTURO' Who is Arturo Vidal? Chelsea transfer target is now learning English - here's what we know WORK OF ART Arturo Vidal already learning English as Chelsea boss Antonio Conte launches £56m summer move STEP OFF THE GAS Man United stars given 5mph speed limit at Carrington training complex… so they don’t crash into TRACTORS Reuters PSG have already splashed the cash on Wolfsburg superstar Julian Draxler EPA PSG are expected to part with Jese Rodriguez before the winter window closes 
The reigning French champs are third in Ligue 1, three points behind leaders Monaco. 
But exits are also likely at the Parc des Princes, with Grzegorz Krychowiak and Jese Rodriguez both set to leave this month. Julian Draxler gets welcomed into the PSG team
